description: A file with .wma extension represents an audio file that is saved in the Advanced Systems Format (ASF) format. ASF is Microsoftâ€™s proprietary format that contains bitstreams encoded by Windows Media Audio 9. In addition to the the audio content, a WMA file also contains metadata objects such as title, album, artist, and genre of the track. WMA files are primarily used for streaming over the web similar to .mp3 files.
